metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1507 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame at libnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted input file. in GitHub repository hpjansson/chafa prior to 1.10.2. chafa: NULL Pointer Dereference in function gif_internal_decode_frame at libnsgif.c:599 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted input file.

criterions.comment: chafa package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
